name: Gladiatus
summary: In the Roman Empire, the player takes the role of a Gladiator to fight in arenas and venture in dungeons to earn the title of hero. The Gladiator's stats and inventory system works in similar ways to Blizzard Entertainment's Diablo. The player may choose to go on expedition to any location of the Italian country and islands and various places within the chosen location. Winning fights in arenas and killing monsters in dungeons earns the player experience as well as gold to purchase better equipment and necessities.
